name: Square Route (itch)
description:
Guide Red Cube through the obstacle courses of varying difficulty!

Level 1: "The Sky is Falling!"
Think fast as grey cubes fall into place around you. Carve a path through the bouncing cuboids to reach the penultimate level.

Level 2: "Stay Grounded"
Keep your composure as grey cubes float around you. Try and try again as you learn the correct route to gain access to the final level.

Level 3: "Don't Blame the Chicane"
The final level. Don't fall of the edge. Time your slides to perfection.

Thank you very much for playing. I hope you enjoyed yourself.
